name: Town Hall
description1: City Walls defend the people of Catan in the cities from the production card limit of the Robber. The City Wall is both a component in Catan: Cities & Knights and a stand-alone variant from Atlantis.
description2: City Walls â€“ Normally, when a player rolls a 7 and a player has more than seven production cards in their hand, they must forfeit half (rounding up) of the production cards to the bank. A City Wall protects players by raising the amount of cards they can hold by 2 (per wall).
